name: PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia (Persero) Tbk
description: PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, commonly known as Telkom Indonesia, is the largest telecommunications and network provider in Indonesia. Established in 1961, Telkom Indonesia plays a pivotal role in connecting the archipelago, providing a comprehensive range of telecommunications services, including fixed-line and mobile communications, internet services, and digital solutions. As a state-owned enterprise, Telkom aims to improve connectivity and promote digital transformation across the nation, catering to individual consumers, businesses, and government entities. The company operates a diverse portfolio of services, including Telkomsel, its mobile subsidiary, which is the largest mobile operator in Indonesia with millions of subscribers. Telkom Indonesia is also a leader in providing broadband internet through its fiber optic network, known as IndiHome, which has significantly contributed to increasing internet penetration in the country. Furthermore, Telkom Indonesia is committed to innovation and has been investing in digital services such as cloud computing, big data analytics, and IoT solutions to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency. With a vision to become a leading digital telecommunications company in Southeast Asia, Telkom Indonesia continues to expand its infrastructure and services to support the growing demand for connectivity and digital solutions.
